item.title: Report X-2024060480
item.description:
Report X-2024060480

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-01
  • City: NORTH LAS VEGAS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SUPERVISOR NOTIFIED OF A HAZMAT LEAKING. RESPONDER CORDONED THE AREA AND BROUGHT THE SPILL CART. RESPONDER USED ZEP ZORBENT TO CLEAN THE SPILL AND BROUGHT THE PACKAGE BACK TO THE DMP CAGE AND STARTED THE REPORT.
